verses.content: Rorêltuhaiin ro an rêl laiin chu rama chun ṭâm a hung tlah a, chun, Juda ram Bethlehema mi pakhat Moab rama um dingin, ama le a nuhmei le a naupasalhai pahni chu an feh a.

Chu mipa hming chu Elimelek a nih, a nuhmei hming chu Naomi, a naupasalhai pahni hming chu Mahlon le Kilion an nih; Juda ram, Bethlehema Ephrath mi an nih. Moab rama chun an feh a, chutaka chun an um ta zing a.
Nisienlakhawm, Elimelek, Nao- mi pasal chu, a thih a, amanu le a naupasalhai pahni chau chu an um tah a.
Chuhai chun Moab nuhmeihai nuhmeiah an nei a, pakhat hming chu Orpah a nih a, pakhat dang hming chu Ruth a nih. Chutaka chun kum sâwm lai an um a.
Chun, Mahlon le Kilion chu an thi ve veh a; chuongchun, chu nuhmei chu a naupasalhai pahni le a pasal chun an thi san tah a.
Chun, Moab rama inthawkin, LALPAIN a mihai chu kanin fâk ding a pêkzie thu a lo hriet leiin, a mohai pahni leh Moab rama inthawk kîr nâwk dingin ân thawk suok a.
Chuongchun, a umnaa inthawk chun a mohai pahni le chun a suok a, Juda rama kîr nâwk dingin an fe tah a.
Chun, Naomi chun a mohai pahni kuoma chun, “Fe unla, in nuhai in ve veah kîr nâwk el ta ro; mithihai chunga le ka chunga in thaw ang tak hin, LALPAIN in chungah ngilnei- takin thaw ve raw se.
Pasal dang ina khawsakna in tuok ve ve theina dingin LALPAIN ngaituopêk raw se cheu,” a tih a. Chuongchun, a fâwp a, râwl insuo meuin an ṭap ta rak el a.
Anni chun, “Ni lo e, i chihai kuoma i kîrnaa chun hung zui kan ti che,” an tih a.
Naomi chun, “Ka naunuhai, kîr nâwk lem ro, iengdingin am mi zui in tih a? In pasal ding naupasalhai ka la vawn zing am a nih?
Kîr nâwk unla, ka naunuhai, fe el lem ro, pasal hang nei dingin ka upa taluo ta sih a. Beiseina ka la nei tiin, vawizân hin pasal nei elin nau- pasalhai nei ding hrim lang khawm,

an puitling chenin in nghâk el ding am a nih? Chu chu lei chun pasal nei loin in um el ding am a nih? Ni lo e, ka naunuhai, ka chunga LALPA kut hieng anga a hung tla ta hi, nangni ta ding hin ka lung a na bêk bêk a nih,” a tih a.
Chuongchun, an râwlhai insuo meuin an ṭap rak rak nâwk a; chun, Orpah chun a tarpinu chu a fâwp a, Ruth ruok chun amanu chu a chel tlat a.
Chun, amanu chun, “En ta, i mo chanpuinu chu a chihai kuoma le a pathien kuoma chun a kîr nâwk tah a, nang khawm i mo chanpuinu zuiin kîr nâwk el rawh aw,” a tih a.

Nisienlakhawm, Ruth chun, “Nang kîrsan ding che le zui lo ding chein mîn fui naw rawh; i fena phawtah fêng ka ta, i riekna phawtah riek ka ta, i chihai chu ka chihai nîng an ta, i Pathien chu ka Pathien nîng a ta;
i thinaa chun thîng ka ta, chutaka chun phûmin um ve el ka tih. Nang le kei hi thina chau naw thil dangin a mi ṭhe ding chun LALPAIN a law law mi law el sienla, chu nêka nasa khawmin,” a tih a.
Naomi chun ama zui a tum tlat a nih ti a hrietin a tosan tah a.
Chuongchun, an pahni chun Bethlehem chenin an fe tah a. Bethlehem an tlung chun anni lei chun a khaw phêkin an inhnîng ta sup sup el a; chun, nuhmeihai chun, “Hi hi Naomi kha a ni maw?” an tih a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Naomi mi ti naw ro, Marah mi ti lem ro, Iengkimthawthei chun lungsiet- thlâktakin a mi thaw ta sih a.

Buriptakin ka suok a, LALPA chun kutbenthekin a mi ṭhuoi kîr nâwk a ni hi: LALPA chun ka chung- ah a lungninawna a suklang a, Iengkimthawthei chun a mi sukrimsi ta hnungin, iengdinga Naomi in mi la ti rawp am a na?” a tih a.
Chuongchun, Naomi chu a hung kîr a, a monu Moab mi Ruth leh, Moab rama inthawk a hung kîr a nih. Bethlehem chu buṭei sîk hun ṭantirin an hung tlung a nih.
